title: Schedule Routine Facility Maintenance
description: A stadium manager needs to schedule the annual inspection and maintenance for the stadium's HVAC system.

tasks.description: Review the stadium's event schedule to find a suitable maintenance window during the off-season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a two-week period with no scheduled events.

tasks.description: Contact the approved HVAC vendor to schedule the maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the service with the vendor.

tasks.description: Create a work order in the facility management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the scheduled maintenance in the system.
